full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ME LHA MCHOD TSUL DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO GA-YANG 'GUG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RINGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI MCHED GROGS AIM CHI BKA' BCU PA DANG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS GZHAN LA PHAN BSAM GYIS SOG YUL 'DI KAD ME LHA MCHOD KYI GA-YANG BLANGS BKRA SHIS PA BYUNG 'DUG KYANG LHA BSKYED PA MCHOD PA'I BYIN RLABS SOGS @006B MED PA'I SOG YIG TSIG LHAD CAN GYI LUGS 'DZIN PA DGA' SNANG MDO, RANG RE LA LHA BSKYED PA'I ME MCHOD ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MCHOG PAR SBYIN SREG GI THAB BSKYED DANG, SLOB DPON PADMA'I MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUG BYED KYI TSIG 'GA' BSDUS NAS RAB 'BYAMS NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYIS GA-YAR KHRAL DU GANG ZHES PA ME MO GLANG GI'I LO'I HOR ZLA BCU PA'I TSE'I BZANG PAR 'GRIGS PA'O, ,'DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I NONGS PA'I CHA MCHIS NA BLA MA LHA LA BSHAGS SHING BZOD PAR GSOL, ,LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD MCHIS PAS GANG THOB DGE BAS, 'GRO BA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I RGYUR CIG , ,,)
